name: 2018 6th Asia Conference on Mechanical and Materials Engineering in ACMME 2018
content: Conference official website：http://www.acmme.org| Meeting time：June 15-18, 2018| Meeting place：Seoul, Korea| Published by：The registered and presented papers will be published into Materials Science Forum . Indexed by Elsevier: SCOPUS, Ei Compendex (CPX). ACMME2017 - Materials Science Forum(MSF) ACMME2016 - Materials Science Forum(MSF) Vol. 880 ACMME2015 - MATEC Vol. 26, 2015 Papers of ACMME2017, ACMME2016 & ACMME2015 are indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus Paper Submission: Mar 30th, 2018| Notification: April 20th, 2018| Registraiton: May 10th, 2018| Submission instructions： 1.Each paper should have no less than 5 pages normally, including all figures, tables, and references. 2.One regular registration is within FIVE Pages. Extra pages will be charged. Conference Contact: Contact: Ms. Priscilla Kuang | Email: info@acmme.org| Tel:+86-13481111110|
